lead_paragraph: OUCHTERLONEY--Robert D.,of New Milford, CT, died on July 4, 2016. Loving husband of Elizabeth (Robbins). Dear father of Robert, Diane, Megan and Karen. He was a partner in the law firm of Chamberlain, Willi, Ouchterloney & Watson in New York City. Funeral Services by Lillis Funeral Home, New Milford, CT. For more information go to our web site. lfh@lillisfuneralhome.word press.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OUCHTERLONEY, ROBERT D.
